body: Anton, Did you watch the video that I posted about loading the measures? The OpenStudio measure that you're using misses input arguments in the xml file. Watch this video and you should be able to load the measure will no issues. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/YmEteape79vGfo3kPlXlWdR5zlfuQHBbq06E-qJ4IS7-IJMnsl36mUJd4GRsbdbQdi8nWZQuCZHFTQT6IHJVDLPHOR25H9xq/loadMeasure.png)
